title: Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf-Edition, GPS Outdoor Watch, Solar Charging Capabilities, Surfing Features, Tracback Routing, Bells Beach 45 MM
descriptions:
Introducing the Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf-Edition, GPS Outdoor Watch! This high-performance watch is perfect for outdoor enthusiasts who love to surf, windsurf, and kiteboard. 

One of the standout features of this watch is its solar charging capabilities. With just 3 hours of sunlight per day in 50,000 lux conditions, the battery life is virtually unlimited in smartwatch mode. Plus, in GPS mode, you can enjoy up to 48 hours of continuous solar charging. No need to worry about running out of power during your adventures!

For surfers, this watch has you covered with wave counter, maximum speed tracking, distance tracking, and tide data. Stay on top of your performance and make the most of every wave.

Windsurfers and kiteboarders will appreciate the GPS position tracking, speed measurement, distance measurement, heart rate measurement, and elevation data for jumps. It's like having a personal coach on your wrist to help you improve your skills.

The Garmin Instinct 2 Solar is also compatible with Surfline Sessions, allowing you to track and share your surf sessions. You'll also receive smart notifications, and with Connect IQ, you can customize your watch with apps, widgets, and data fields. 

With preloaded activity profiles for running, biking, swimming, and strength training, you'll have all your favorite activities covered. The watch also features a 3-axis compass, barometric altimeter, and satellite systems including GPS, GLONASS, and Galileo for accurate navigation.

In terms of health monitoring, this watch has it all. Track your heart rate, sleep, pulse ox (limited availability), respiration, and stress levels to maintain a healthy lifestyle.

Designed to withstand the toughest conditions, the Garmin Instinct 2 Solar is water-rated up to 100 meters and offers thermal resistance and shock resistance. The case is made of fiber-reinforced polymer, and the scratch-resistant Corning Gorilla glass ensures durability.

The watch comes in a size of 45 MM, making it comfortable and stylish on your wrist. It also includes other features like Garmin Pay, making your transactions quick and convenient.

Get ready to unleash your outdoor adventure with the Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf-Edition, GPS Outdoor Watch. Upgrade your gear and take your performance to the next level!

In addition to its water and shock resistance, this watch features a 3-axis compass, barometric altimeter, and support for GPS, GLONASS, and Galileo satellite systems for accurate navigation. Keep track of your health with features like heart rate monitoring, sleep tracking, Pulse Ox (limited availability), and respiration tracking.

With a water rating of 100 meters and thermal resistance, this watch is built to withstand the elements. The case is made of fiber-reinforced polymer, and the glass is scratch-resistant Corning Gorilla glass.

The Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf-Edition, GPS Outdoor Watch comes in a size of 45 MM, making it comfortable to wear during your outdoor activities. It also comes with preloaded activity profiles for running, biking, swimming, and strength training, allowing you to track your performance across various sports.

Don't miss out on this amazing watch that combines style, durability, and advanced features. Get your Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf-Edition, GPS Outdoor Watch today and take your outdoor adventures to the next level!
